{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":118411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Moreover...\""},{"lineNumber":118412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「混乱を起こすことにかけては、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When it comes to causing chaos,"},{"lineNumber":118413,"originalJapaneseLine":"　天性の才能がある。","translatedEnglishLine":"you have a natural talent."},{"lineNumber":118414,"originalJapaneseLine":"　属性と言ってもいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"You could even call it an attribute.\""},{"lineNumber":118415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かに、不幸な女性を何人も救い、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Certainly, you have saved many unfortunate women,"},{"lineNumber":118416,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幸せの道へ導いたことが何度もあるようだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and have led them onto paths of happiness many times.\""},{"lineNumber":118417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、その通りだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, that's exactly right!\""},{"lineNumber":118418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、同時に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, at the same time..."},{"lineNumber":118419,"originalJapaneseLine":"　平穏に暮らす女性もまた、","translatedEnglishLine":"women living peaceful lives as well,"},{"lineNumber":118420,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何度も不幸にしてきている」","translatedEnglishLine":"you have made unhappy many times.\""},{"lineNumber":118421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ummm...\""},{"lineNumber":118422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう趣味なのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that your kind of hobby?\""},{"lineNumber":118423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「考えたこともないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've never thought about it."},{"lineNumber":118424,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やりたいようにやってきただけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've just done as I pleased.\""},{"lineNumber":118425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},{"lineNumber":118426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「度々聞いた評価。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"An evaluation I've heard often."},{"lineNumber":118427,"originalJapaneseLine":"　面白い男、というのがしっくり来るな」","translatedEnglishLine":"The description 'interesting man' fits well.\""},{"lineNumber":118428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また、どさくさ紛れという奴が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, the thing called taking advantage of confusion,"},{"lineNumber":118429,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君は得意のようだが……","translatedEnglishLine":"seems to be your specialty..."},{"lineNumber":118430,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なるほど、自らが起こした混乱でそうするのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you do that by using the chaos you've caused yourself.\""},{"lineNumber":118431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、まとめはいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, stop the summary."},{"lineNumber":118432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結局結論はどうなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"So what's the conclusion after all?\""},{"lineNumber":118433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「自身を英雄と憚ることなく言っていたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You boldly called yourself a hero, but,"},{"lineNumber":118434,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の感想としては……","translatedEnglishLine":"my impression is...\""},{"lineNumber":118435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君は英雄というよりも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are more than a hero..."},{"lineNumber":118436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火事場泥棒だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"a looter at a disaster scene.\""},{"lineNumber":118437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、火事場泥棒！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a looter at a disaster scene!\""},{"lineNumber":118438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph..."},{"lineNumber":118439,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、今日は良い機会となった。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, today was a good opportunity."},{"lineNumber":118440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこに関しては礼を言おう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will thank you for that.\""},{"lineNumber":118441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普段、外に出ないからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't usually go outside."},{"lineNumber":118442,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多くの者の多くの表情を見た」","translatedEnglishLine":"I saw many expressions on many people.\""},{"lineNumber":118443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰もが、今を懸命に生きていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone was living earnestly in the moment."},{"lineNumber":118444,"originalJapaneseLine":"　久しく忘れていた感触だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a feeling I had long forgotten.\""},{"lineNumber":118445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この城は賑やかだからな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This castle is lively after all..."},{"lineNumber":118446,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たまには……こういうのも良い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes... something like this is nice...\""},{"lineNumber":118447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……聞いてないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Didn't you hear that?\""},{"lineNumber":118448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ではな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":118449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーん……がーん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah... gah..."},{"lineNumber":118450,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、俺が、火事場泥棒……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm... a looter at a disaster scene...\""},{"lineNumber":118451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gaaaaaah...\""},{"lineNumber":118452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……そろそろ出ようかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... maybe I should head out soon...\""},{"lineNumber":118453,"originalJapaneseLine":"深夜――","translatedEnglishLine":"Late at night—"},{"lineNumber":118454,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス親衛隊の少女が","translatedEnglishLine":"A girl from the Lizas Royal Guard"},{"lineNumber":118455,"originalJapaneseLine":"人気のないランス城の温泉を楽しんでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was enjoying the deserted hot springs at Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":118456,"originalJapaneseLine":"と――","translatedEnglishLine":"When—"},{"lineNumber":118457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、あっ、きゃあああああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah, kyahhhhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":118458,"originalJapaneseLine":"少女は誤って石けんを踏んでしまい、","translatedEnglishLine":"The girl accidentally stepped on soap,"},{"lineNumber":118459,"originalJapaneseLine":"思いっきりすっころんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and slipped hard."},{"lineNumber":118460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、れ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":118461,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、来るべき衝撃が来ないことに気づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, realizing the expected impact didn't come,"},{"lineNumber":118462,"originalJapaneseLine":"少女はそっと閉じていた瞳を開いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the girl slowly opened her closed eyes."},{"lineNumber":118463,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":118464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、ま、魔人……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, m-majin (demon)..."},{"lineNumber":118465,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケッセルリンク……さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring...san.\""},{"lineNumber":118466,"originalJapaneseLine":"一切気配を感じさせなかったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though not sensing any presence at all,"},{"lineNumber":118467,"originalJapaneseLine":"今まで共に温泉に入っていたらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"it seemed they had been in the hot spring together until now."},{"lineNumber":118468,"originalJapaneseLine":"その魔人が今、少女の体を片腕で軽く支えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"That majin was now gently supporting the girl's body with one arm."},{"lineNumber":118469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怪我はないかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you hurt?\""},{"lineNumber":118470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ！　だだ、大丈夫です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes! I'm totally okay!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「混乱を起こすことにかけては、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could even call it an attribute."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに、不幸な女性を何人も救い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certainly, you have saved many unfortunate women,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幸せの道へ導いたことが何度もあるようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have led them onto paths of happiness many times."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平穏に暮らす女性もまた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: women living peaceful lives as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度も不幸にしてきている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have made unhappy many times."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やりたいようにやってきただけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've just done as I pleased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白い男、というのがしっくり来るな」
「また、どさくさ紛れという奴が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, the thing called taking advantage of confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、自らが起こした混乱でそうするのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you do that by using the chaos you've caused yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局結論はどうなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So what's the conclusion after all?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自身を英雄と憚ることなく言っていたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You boldly called yourself a hero, but,
a looter at a disaster scene."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今日は良い機会となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, today was a good opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに関しては礼を言おう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will thank you for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの者の多くの表情を見た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I saw many expressions on many people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰もが、今を懸命に生きていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone was living earnestly in the moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久しく忘れていた感触だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a feeling I had long forgotten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには……こういうのも良い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes... something like this is nice..."
I'm... a looter at a disaster scene..."
"Phew... maybe I should head out soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス親衛隊の少女が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl from the Lizas Royal Guard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人気のないランス城の温泉を楽しんでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was enjoying the deserted hot springs at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女は誤って石けんを踏んでしまい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl accidentally stepped on soap,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いっきりすっころんだ。
しかし、来るべき衝撃が来ないことに気づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, realizing the expected impact didn't come,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女はそっと閉じていた瞳を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the girl slowly opened her closed eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一切気配を感じさせなかったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though not sensing any presence at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで共に温泉に入っていたらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seemed they had been in the hot spring together until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その魔人が今、少女の体を片腕で軽く支えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That majin was now gently supporting the girl's body with one arm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！　だだ、大丈夫です！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「混乱を起こすことにかけては、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could even call it an attribute."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに、不幸な女性を何人も救い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certainly, you have saved many unfortunate women,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幸せの道へ導いたことが何度もあるようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and have led them onto paths of happiness many times."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平穏に暮らす女性もまた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: women living peaceful lives as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度も不幸にしてきている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have made unhappy many times."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やりたいようにやってきただけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've just done as I pleased."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白い男、というのがしっくり来るな」
「また、どさくさ紛れという奴が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, the thing called taking advantage of confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、自らが起こした混乱でそうするのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you do that by using the chaos you've caused yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局結論はどうなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So what's the conclusion after all?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自身を英雄と憚ることなく言っていたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You boldly called yourself a hero, but,
a looter at a disaster scene."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今日は良い機会となった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, today was a good opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに関しては礼を言おう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will thank you for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの者の多くの表情を見た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I saw many expressions on many people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰もが、今を懸命に生きていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone was living earnestly in the moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久しく忘れていた感触だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a feeling I had long forgotten."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには……こういうのも良い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes... something like this is nice..."
I'm... a looter at a disaster scene..."
"Phew... maybe I should head out soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス親衛隊の少女が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl from the Lizas Royal Guard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人気のないランス城の温泉を楽しんでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was enjoying the deserted hot springs at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女は誤って石けんを踏んでしまい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl accidentally stepped on soap,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いっきりすっころんだ。
しかし、来るべき衝撃が来ないことに気づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, realizing the expected impact didn't come,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少女はそっと閉じていた瞳を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the girl slowly opened her closed eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一切気配を感じさせなかったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though not sensing any presence at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで共に温泉に入っていたらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seemed they had been in the hot spring together until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その魔人が今、少女の体を片腕で軽く支えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That majin was now gently supporting the girl's body with one arm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ！　だだ、大丈夫です！」
